label: Undergraduate Open Seminar
description: Experimental course on special topics pertinent to the disciplines studied within the College of Media. Topics will vary. Approved for letter and S/U grading. May be repeated in the same or separate terms to a maximum of 6 hours if topics vary.
courseSectionInformation: Approved for letter and S/U grading. May be repeated in the same or separate terms to a maximum of 6 hours if topics vary.
